title: Rahu Transit in the 10th House: Ambition, Visibility, and Power Drive
summary: When Rahu transits the 10th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, career ambition, public image, and hunger for authority intensify sharply. You feel compelled to rise fast, gain recognition, and break conventional paths to success. Sudden opportunities can elevate status, but shortcuts or ethical compromises may create backlash. Authority figures and systems test credibility. This transit rewards innovation, strategic networking, and calculated risks, teaching that sustainable power comes from discipline, transparency, and consistent performance.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Strong hunger for success and status

sections.title: Relationships
points: Need balance between work and bonds

sections.title: Finance
points: Income linked to status and reach

closing: Rahu in the 10th house can bring meteoric rise, but only integrity and discipline turn fame into lasting authority.
